venue.name: Half Moon Coffee and Grille Cafe

item.description:
This is another place where you can BYOB and comes highly recommended by one of our loyal members...Richard L.
"You can BYOB which is always nice, and they don't charge a corking fee. They even bring out glasses and will kindly open the bottle for you without prompting."

The menu includes, pasta, pannini's, pizza and salads, plus their specials change daily.
The food and amibiance is supposed to be great!!

They do not have a website but I found a site that has reviews.

http://www.yelp.com/b...

It sounds like a great place for our group, hope to see you there!!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: BYOB - Half Moon Coffee and Grille Cafe
